global-cfp.description: Did you know Washington D.C. is the capital of the United States? The nation's capital also claims the title of one of the smallest cities to serve as the seat of national government—the City of Washington was just 10 blocks at its founding. This Washington D.C. travel poster shows the White House, where every President since John Adams has lived, worked or visited.
